scripts.build: pnpm --filter @middleman/backend build && pnpm --filter @middleman/ui build && pnpm --filter @middleman/site build
scripts.prod:start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,ui "NODE_ENV=production MIDDLEMAN_PORT=47287 pnpm --filter @middleman/backend start" "pnpm --filter @middleman/ui preview -- --port 47289 --strictPort --host ${MIDDLEMAN_HOST:-$(node --env-file-if-exists=.env -p 'process.env.MIDDLEMAN_HOST || "127.0.0.1"' 2>/dev/null)}"
